title: CEO: Raspberry Pi is “where we said we’d be” for 2023, recovery to follow
description: Buyers should start to see a "substantial recovery" of the 3, 3B+, and 4 models .... or they could just wait for the 5.

title: How do you keep time?
description: I use my shell nagme() function then play a .wav that is the last few seconds of the scene in Apollo 13 where they do a blind course correction and Tom Hanks's character yells, "Shutdown!"

title: Italy allocates funds to shield workers from AI replacement threat
description: But what happens if AI replaces the job I'm training for, while I'm training for it?

title: deepin Linux V23 can replace Windows 11 on your PC
description: What about my Windows programs that don't run on Linux?
